D e s c r i p t i o n
*********************

What is PPTmovie?
Easy. It is a nice tool for converting your presentation to video files. 

With PPTmovie not only you can convert .ppt files to .avi, .mpeg, .mp4, .mov, .flv files but also add narrations or music background while converting. 

Video

With PPTmovie on your computer you can convert your powerpoint presentations to several video formats. So you can make your presentation available for everyone who can even doesn't have a computer.

Supported video output formats: PPTmovie converts presentations to AVI, MPEG-1, MPEG-2, MP4, MOV and FLV video formats.
This means that you can:
1. Publish your presentation on YouTube or another video sharing website
2. Burn your presentation to CD or DVD disk and play it back on a DVD player
3. Transfer your presentation to a portable device such as iPodÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â®, PSPÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ or mobile phone.
4. Convert your PowerPoint presentation to Flash and movie.

Audio

Record your narration or record the background music. It's hard to imagine anything easier. To record the music you just need to turn the favorite track on and PPTmovie will record it from your speakers without any noise while converting.
Or you can record your comments to any slide you would like by using your microphone.

Conversion itself

For converting powerpoint presentation file to video file there are two options:
1. Manual conversion. The delay between slides will as you press next button on PPTmovie interface.
2. Automatic conversion. Define the delay between slides and don't worry about pressing any buttons at all.
3. As defined in your presentation. If you already have slide timings defined in your presentation PPTmovie will copy them.
